pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7-11 64bit
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL support + ~2GB vram
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: multiple threads for faster loading

short_description: Resonating Worlds is a Turn-based strategy game, with alot of Character customization and progression. Mysterious towers have appeared in the world of Atuhm. These towers are a connection between worlds. But the towers bear a dark secret, that waits to be uncovered...
